name: Addictive Race and Police Chase
description:
Featuring a realistic and very challenging Midtown map, with AWESOME Chase Cops and Moving Traffic to keep you on your toes!

You can practice your driving skills in Midtown, but you should not run more than 40 MPH if not .. POLICE CHASE BEGINS!

GAME FEATURES

▶ Practice mode.
▶ Countdown mode: 25 levels where you have to complete the circuit through the checkpoints in the set time.
▶ Be the first mode: 25 levels where 4 cars compete, and to win you must arrive first.
▶ Multiplayer mode: Connects up to 4 devices on the same Wi-Fi network and competes in 25 circuits.
▶ Dynamic Traffic to test your Driving Precision to the Limits.
▶ Easy driving system. Touch any part of the right screen to accelerate and any part to the left of the screen to brake. Tilt to drive.
▶ Realistic simulation, car deformation, smoke, lights, etc.
